itemDescription: George Cross recipient in World War II

wikipedia_page.main: Dennis Arthur Copperwheat GC (23 May 1914 – 8 September 1992) of the Royal Navy won the George Cross for the heroism he displayed on 22 March 1942 in scuttling a burning ammunition ship in Valletta harbour, Malta.

response: * Dennis Copperwheat (191492), British Navy sailor who won the George Cross for heroism displayed during the defence of Malta in 1942
